meanings.definition: Consisting of five parts or elements.
meanings.sent1: The pentomic puzzle had five pieces to put together.
meanings.sent2: The pentomic flower had five colorful petals.
meanings.sent3: The pentomic cake was cut into five equal slices for the party.
meanings.sent4: Her pentomic personality shone through in her diverse interests.
meanings.sent5: The pentomic rainbow displayed five vibrant colors across the sky.

meanings.definition: Divided into five parts or sections.
meanings.sent1: The pentomic bookcase had five shelves for organizing books.
meanings.sent2: The pentomic map was divided into five distinct regions.
meanings.sent3: The pentomic team split into five groups for the competition.
meanings.sent4: His pentomic schedule was carefully planned with five different tasks.
meanings.sent5: The pentomic highway led to five different destinations.
